description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Join the Space Vixens and defend Earth from the alien onslaught! Fight your way through 21 waves of enemies to unlock new game modes in this furious 4 player shooter!
